title: Bill Gates built a $30 million "LifeBoat" underground luxury bunker 300 feet underground. Coincidentally Jeffery Epstein was on the Board of Directors, and George Soros was major investor.  What are they expecting a civil war? Gates can live locked in a vault up to 3 years in this bomb-proof bunker!

author.bio: No one likes a peeping Tom

body: A bunker won't help without defenders, hope they have an army
body_html: A bunker won't help without defenders, hope they have an army

guild.description: Anything that American and world citizens were never meant to know about... a variety of topics ranging from FBI crimes and cover-ups to space exploration, secret CIA projects, Courtroom Crimes, Wall Street insider trades, to human rights and war crimes and really great celebrity gossip and conspiracy theories that turned out to be true! Come and contribute what you know IF you have documentation. This is not a conspiracy "THEORY" guild, but a FACTUAL collections of secrets and inconvenient truths that make you gasp.

author.bio:
Faith, Hope, and Love is the path to Life, Liberty, and Happiness.

There is no justification for any human authority.

body: Is everyone surprised that the princes and princesses of the court are trying to retain their lifestyles until the very end? Expect that they will gladly kill all of us to buy themselves even a minute longer of cocaine infused underage rape parties.
